docs.snippet: Roosevelt Hospital poured its manpower and medical resources into the first portrayal yesterday of its newly organized peacetime disaster unit. Set up to cope with civilian catastrophes, the disaster section, said to be the only one existent in a ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Roosevelt Hospital poured its manpower and medical resources into the first portrayal yesterday of its newly organized peacetime disaster unit. Set up to cope with civilian catastrophes, the disaster section, said to be the only one existent in a non-city-operated hospital, put on a full-dress rehearsal.

headline.main: Hospital in Dress Rehearsal Shows Disaster Unit in Action; Mock Mobilization Under Way in 6 Minutes at Roosevelt Institution -- All Its Manpower and Medical Resources Take Part

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 23 -- A 50 per cent increase in membership, greatly increased funds, expansion of all programs and intensification of effort in every field of activity were among the major obligations assumed today by 5,000 delegates to the Amer...
docs.abstract: D Smith repts on Amer Red Cross disaster expenditures for last yr

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 23 -- A 50 per cent increase in membership, greatly increased funds, expansion of all programs and intensification of effort in every field of activity were among the major obligations assumed today by 5,000 delegates to the American Red Cross Convention as the first essentials of their part in preparedness for national defense.

headline.main: RED CROSS ACCEPTS BIG EXPANSION TASK; Delegates Told Membership Rise by 50%, With Fund Increases Required ARMY, NAVY HAIL SERVICE Volunteer Services Vote to Take Only Citizens for Ambulance and Canteen Duties

docs.snippet: Ninety-six committees, organized to function with military precision, are ready to care for this city's population and lessen the blow of disaster, if one comes. Within a few days the Major Disaster Emergency Council, under which the committees we...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ninety-six committees, organized to function with military precision, are ready to care for this city's population and lessen the blow of disaster, if one comes. Within a few days the Major Disaster Emergency Council, under which the committees were formed, will move into an earthquake-proof building in Westlake Park. between the business district and Hollywood. This preparedness is purely a civic - ndertaking.

headline.main: DISASTER COUNCIL WATCHES OVER CITY; Los Angeles Emergency Group Prepares to Act When Community Needs Service 96 COMMITTEES TRAINED Idea Which Had Its Inception in 1926 Attains Organization as a Civic Undertaking

docs.snippet: MIAMI, Oct. 14 (AP). -- An American Legion committee investigating the death of several hundred veterans in Florida keys camps in the hurricane of Sept. 2 was told today by A.J. Wheeler, adjutant of the Spanish-American War Veterans post here, tha...
docs.abstract: Hearing on veterans' deaths in Fla hurricane
docs.lead_paragraph: MIAMI, Oct. 14 (AP). -- An American Legion committee investigating the death of several hundred veterans in Florida keys camps in the hurricane of Sept. 2 was told today by A.J. Wheeler, adjutant of the Spanish-American War Veterans post here, that "the officers deserted when the storm approached and left the men to their fate."

headline.main: MEN IN KEY CAMPS CALLED 'DESERTED'; Witness at Legion Inquiry Says Officers Left Veterans "to Their Fate." WASHINGTON IS ACCUSED Declared to Have Delayed a Day in Authorizing Florida Storm Relief Train.

docs.snippet: ALBANY, July 8. -- Governor Lehman directed the Conservation Department, State Troopers, National Guard and Highway Division to give any aid required today to the territory in the regions devastated by floods in yesterday's downpour....
docs.abstract: Orders aid for N Y S flood victims

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.lead_paragraph: ALBANY, July 8. -- Governor Lehman directed the Conservation Department, State Troopers, National Guard and Highway Division to give any aid required today to the territory in the regions devastated by floods in yesterday's downpour.

headline.main: GOVERNOR ORDERS WIDE AID IN FLOODS; Conservation Forces, Troopers, Guardsmen and Road Workers Will Aid Sufferers.

docs.snippet: Queens was designated a federal disaster area Friday because of intense flood damage to hundreds of homes during a storm on Aug. 8, federal officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Queens was designated a federal disaster area Friday because of intense flood damage to hundreds of homes during a storm on Aug. 8, federal officials said.

headline.print_headline: Queens Residents to Get Disaster Aid
headline.main: Queens Residents to Get Disaster Aid
